reasoning: The 404 error when accessing article detail pages is a real functional failure. The Wiki module is installed (visible in navigation as 'WIKI TEST') but article URLs return 404 errors, indicating a URL routing misconfiguration that prevents the core Wiki article viewing and editing functionality from working.
evidence_summary: Screenshot shows a 404 'page cannot be found' error page when attempting to access an article detail page. The Wiki extension appears installed (WIKI TEST in nav menu) but individual article pages are completely inaccessible, blocking all article-related functionality including the concurrent editing feature being tested.
scenario_id: Evoq.Social.Wiki::Article Editing and Updates::Concurrent editing scenarios
